network_overview: A 70 ms control-plane snapshot shows one GTPv2-C Create Session Request/Response pair and two independent Diameter Command-272 (3GPP CCR/CCA) exchanges. One Diameter transaction ends with DIAMETER_END_USER_SERVICE_DENIED (4010), and the GTPv2-C response carries an unmapped cause 209.

pattern_matches.explanation: Standard Gx/Gy CCA rejection when OCS/PCRF denies service (e.g., quota exhausted, roaming barred, or subscriber barred).

observations.finding: Two separate Diameter sessions and one GTP-C session in 70 ms; all procedures fail.
observations.evidence: Success rates 0 % for GTP-Msg-0x10, GTP-Msg-0x11, Cmd-272

observations.finding: GTPv2-C cause code 209 is not defined in 3GPP TS 29.274 v17.4.0.

root_causes.description: Diameter Credit-Control answer (Cmd-272) returns Result-Code 4010 (DIAMETER_END_USER_SERVICE_DENIED), causing the bearer setup to be aborted.
root_causes.impact: Subscriber cannot establish EPS bearer; data/voice service blocked.
root_causes.confidence_justification: Explicit 4010 code in captured CCA message; no subsequent GTP Create Session success observed.
evidence_refs: Same millisecond GTP-C reject with cause 209

inconclusive_aspects.reason: Code 209 is not mapped in public 3GPP or Wireshark tables; could be vendor-specific.
inconclusive_aspects.additional_capture_needed: Vendor documentation or GTP-C trace from issuing node to clarify local cause table.

inconclusive_aspects.reason: No GTP-U or RTP packets observed at this capture point.
inconclusive_aspects.additional_capture_needed: Parallel user-plane capture on S1-U/S5-U to confirm bearer establishment failure.

recommendations.action: Check OCS/PCRF logs for subscriber with session-id cmg01;017d48eb;62a19cd9;427012937268094-14db0835 to determine why service denied.
recommendations.rationale: 4010 explicitly points to policy/charging function; logs will show quota, roaming, or profile issue.

recommendations.action: Obtain vendor mapping for GTP-C cause 209 from S-GW/P-GW supplier to confirm exact failure reason.
recommendations.rationale: Ensures correct alignment between Diameter rejection and GTP-C cause propagated to MME.

session_analysis.signaling_health: All observed control-plane procedures fail; Diameter 4010 and GTP-C unmapped cause 209 indicate systematic rejection.
session_analysis.user_plane_health: Not observable at this capture point.
session_analysis.cross_plane_correlation: Diameter service denial immediately precedes GTP-C failure, suggesting policy control blocked bearer creation.

sequence_diagram:
sequenceDiagram
    autonumber
    86.62.214.55->>10.47.17.114: GTPv2-C Create Session Request (teid 0x00000000)
    10.47.27.65->>10.47.9.86: Diameter CCR (Cmd-272) sess-id cmg01,017d48eb...
    10.47.9.86-->>10.47.27.65: Diameter CCA Result-Code 4010 (DIAMETER_END_USER_SERVICE_DENIED)
    10.47.17.114-->>86.62.214.55: GTPv2-C Create Session Response cause 209 (UNMAPPED)
